body:
Hello everyone,

Officials have already begun the discussion of our next event and we are open to suggestions of what you think the next event name should be below. PG only, no NSFW name suggestions. This gives the opportunity for you community members to have a part in our naming process & maybe other tournament things. Keep in mind that the gamemode is King of The Hill (including 5CP/ Capture The Flag).

Regards,

The Official Team 



EDIT: People began to go off topic so I decided to Lock/Un-Sticky. (Walt)

replies.body:
[Kanye]

May the cap forgive us
May the caps be with us
And that magic hour
I seen good Christians
Make cap decisions
Oh she do it,
What happened to "king of the hill"
Oh she lose it
She putting on her make up
She casually allure
Text message break up, the casualty of tour
How cap gone wake up and not cap me no more
I thought I was the ass hole, I guess it's rubbing off
Hood phenomenon, the Lebron of rhyme
Hard to be humble when you cappin on a jumbotron
I'm looking at her like "this what you really wantedt, huh?"
What we argue anyway, oh I forgot its summertime

[Chorus x1]

Put your hands to the constellations
They way you capture the hill should be a sin, you my sensation
I know I'm preaching to the congregation
We love Jesus but you done learned a lot from Satan

replies.body:
Captum Royale 

Captum part for Capture the Flag (captum = capture in latin) and Royale to reference this being a PvP tourney plus King of the Hill (with kings being part of royalty).
